arts.ttl: Cardiff vs Burton Albion: EFL League One Preview, Gameweek 7, 2025
arts.sum: Cardiff City welcome struggling Burton Albion to the Cardiff City Stadium on Tuesday night as a win amongst results going their way would see the bluebirds sitting on top of the League One tree going into the weekend's fixtures. Darren Bent scored when they last faced each other in March 2018, a 3-1 win for Cardiff aided them as they were eventually promoted to the Premier League that season whereas Burton were relegated to League One .
